game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you will embark on an adventure to find the long-lost treasure of Captain Jack. Follow the clues, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges to uncover the treasure's whereabouts.
game.reward: 300 gold coins, a rare artifact, and the title of Treasure Hunter

task.description: Your journey begins at the old lighthouse. Look for the broken stone near the entrance and you will find the first clue.
The clue you found leads to an ancient library. Use your knowledge of ancient languages to decipher the secret message hidden within an ancient book.
To unlock the treasure's chamber, you need to find the golden key hidden within the treacherous cave of Crystal Falls. Be careful, for danger awaits!
Once you have the golden key, head to the abandoned mansion on Haunted Hill. Solve the riddle written on the mansion's doors to unlock the final clue.
With all the clues in hand, make your way to the secret island mentioned in the final clue. There, buried beneath the lone palm tree, you will find the long-lost treasure of Captain Jack!
